00025 void TargetImgLabel::setImage(const QImage &labelImage)
00026 {
00027    m_image = new QImage(labelImage);
00028 //   m_image = new QImage(labelImage.size(), QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied);
00029 //   *m_image = labelImage;
00030 
00031    this->resize(m_image->size());
00032    m_bHasImage = true;
00033    m_bHasOverlayImage = false;
00034 
00035    update();
00036 }
00037 void TargetImgLabel::overlayImage(const QImage &otherImage, int nXoffset, int nYoffset)

00041    m_nYoffset = nYoffset;

00043 //   *m_overlayImage = otherImage;

00048 }

00060 void TargetImgLabel::paintEvent(QPaintEvent * /* event */)
00061 {
00062    if(m_bHasImage)
00063       {
00064 
00065       // had originally only this:
00066 //      QPainter painter(this);
00067 //      painter.drawImage(0, 0, *m_image);
00068 
00069           QImage imageWithOverlay = QImage(m_image->size(), QImage::Format_ARGB32_Premultiplied);
00070           QPainter painter(&imageWithOverlay);
00071 
00072           painter.setCompositionMode(QPainter::CompositionMode_Source);
00073           painter.fillRect(imageWithOverlay.rect(), Qt::transparent);
00074 
00075           painter.setCompositionMode(QPainter::CompositionMode_SourceOver);
00076           painter.drawImage(0, 0, *m_image);
00077 
00078       if(m_bHasOverlayImage)
00079          {
00080 //         painter.setCompositionMode(QPainter::CompositionMode_SourceOver);  // Opaque image
00081 //         painter.setCompositionMode(QPainter::CompositionMode_Exclusion);   // Bluish transparency overlay
00082          painter.setCompositionMode(QPainter::CompositionMode_Screen);
00083          painter.drawImage(m_nXoffset, m_nYoffset, *m_overlayImage);
00084          }
00085 
00086 
00087        if(m_bHasCorrResults)
00088           {
00089           painter.setCompositionMode(QPainter::CompositionMode_SourceOver);
00090 
00091           painter.setPen(QPen(Qt::green, 3, Qt::DashDotLine, Qt::RoundCap,
00092            Qt::RoundJoin));
00093           painter.setBrush( Qt::NoBrush);
00094            QRect rect(m_originPoint, m_rectSize);
00095           painter.drawRect(rect);
00096          }
00097 
00098        painter.end();
00099 
00100        QPainter painter2(this);
00101        painter2.drawImage(0, 0, imageWithOverlay);
00102        painter2.end();
00103 
00104       }
00105 }

00107 void TargetImgLabel::drawEnclosedMatch(const QPoint originPoint, const QSize rectSize)
00108 {
00109    m_originPoint = originPoint;
00110    m_rectSize = rectSize;
00111 
00112    m_bHasCorrResults = true;
00113 
00114    update();
00115 }
00116 
00117 void TargetImgLabel::eraseEnclosedMatch()
00118 {
00119    m_bHasCorrResults = false;
00120    m_bHasOverlayImage = false;
00121 }
